TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Splitter extends System.Windows.Forms.Control

summary.span: 表示允许用户调整停靠控件大小的拆分器控件。

span.span: Represents a splitter control that enables the user to resize docked controls.

summary.span: 已被 取代，且仅为与早期版本兼容而提供。

span.span: has been replaced by and is provided only for compatibility with previous versions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件允许用户调整停靠到的边缘的控件的大小控件在运行时。The control enables the user to resize controls that are docked to the edges of the control at run time. 当用户将鼠标移过控件，光标发生变化，指示控件停靠到可以调整控件的大小。When the user passes the mouse pointer over the control, the cursor changes to indicate that the controls docked to the control can be resized. 控件使用户能够重设大小的停靠的控件的停靠顺序中之前。The control enables the user to resize the docked control that is immediately before it in the docking order. 因此，若要允许用户调整停靠的控件的大小，停靠所需的用户能够重设大小为一个容器的边缘的控件，然后将拆分器停靠到该容器在同一端。Therefore, to enable the user to resize a docked control, dock the control you want the user to be able to resize to an edge of a container, and then dock a splitter to the same side of that container. 例如，若要创建一个窗口，类似于 Windows 资源管理器中，添加向窗体控件，并设置其属性设置为`DockStyle.Left`。For example, to create a window similar to Windows Explorer, add a control to a form and set its property to `DockStyle.Left`. 添加向窗体控件，并设置其属性设置为`DockStyle.Left`也。Add a control to the form and set its property to `DockStyle.Left` as well. 若要完成的窗体布局，添加控件，并设置其属性设置为`DockStyle.Fill`具有占据窗体上的剩余空间。To complete the form layout, add a control and set its property to `DockStyle.Fill` to have the occupy the remaining space on the form. 在运行时，用户可以然后调整大小的宽度控件 (以及控件) 通过移动控件。At run time, the user can then resize the width of the control (as well as the control) by moving the control. 若要确保控件不会调整大小控件停靠到的大小太小，无法对用户非常有用，您将使用和属性。To ensure that the control does not resize controls docked to a size that is too small to be useful to the user, you use the and properties. 并属性确定左侧和右侧停靠控件的最小大小 (或顶部和底部如果水平控件) 大小可调整到。The and properties determine the minimum size that controls docked to the left and right (or top and bottom if a horizontal control) can be sized to. 如果窗体上的其他控件的停靠控件以显示特定的边框样式，则可以使用属性以匹配停靠到该控件的边框样式。If the other controls on your form that the control is docked to display a specific style of border, you can use the property to match the border style of the controls that are docked to it. 你可能想要设置的最大大小限制在控件控件停靠到。You might want to set a maximum size limit on controls that the control is docked to. 和事件使你可以确定当用户正在调整停靠的控件大小。The and events enable you to determine when the user is resizing a docked control. 可以使用中的事件处理程序属性或事件，以确定控件大小的停靠控件并将其设置为不同的值来限制的停靠属性为指定的最大宽度的控件的宽度 (或如果水平对齐的高度控件)。You can use the property in an event handler for the or events to determine the size of the control that the control is docked to and set the property to a different value to limit the docked control's width to a specified maximum width (or height if a horizontally aligned control). > [!NOTE] > 重设大小控件使用只能完成控件使用鼠标。Resizing a control using the control can only be done using the mouse. 不能访问使用键盘控制。It is not possible to access the control using the keyboard. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用控制结合和控件，创建一个窗口，类似于 Windows 资源管理器。The following code example uses a control in combination with and controls to create a window similar to Windows Explorer. 若要识别和控件、 节点和项添加到这两个控件。To identify the and controls, nodes and items are added to both controls. 该示例使用并的属性以免或控件的大小太小或太大。The example uses the and properties of the to prevent the or control from being sized too small or too large. 此示例需要在此示例中创建的方法在中定义，该方法调用的构造函数从。This example requires that the method created in this example is defined within a and that the method is called from the constructor of the . [!code-cpp[Splitter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Splitter Example/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Splitter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Splitter Example/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Splitter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Splitter Example/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下和属性设置为 25。By default, the and properties are set to 25. 属性设置为`DockStyle.Left`默认情况下。The property is set to `DockStyle.Left` by default. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用控制结合和控件，创建一个窗口，类似于 Windows 资源管理器。The following code example uses a control in combination with and controls to create a window similar to Windows Explorer. 若要识别和控件、 节点和项添加到这两个控件。To identify the and controls, nodes and items are added to both controls. 该示例使用并的属性以免或控件的大小太小或太大。The example uses the and properties of the to prevent the or control from being sized too small or too large. 此示例需要在此示例中创建的方法在中定义，该方法调用的构造函数从。This example requires that the method created in this example is defined within a and that the method is called from the constructor of the . remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性通常是时使用这些控件停靠控件来显示与特定的边框样式和所需控件以匹配其显示样式。This property is typically used when the controls the control is docked to are displayed with a specific border style and you want the control to match their display style. 例如，如果你有和一个控件控件将在你想要显示没有任何边框，您可以设置停靠到属性设置为`BorderStyle.None`。For example, if you have a and a control that the control will be docked to that you want to display without any borders, you can set the property to `BorderStyle.None`.

span.span: Gets or sets which borders are docked to its parent control and determines how a is resized with its parent.

The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来定义如何控件自动调整大小调整其父控件的大小时。Use the property to define how a control is automatically resized as its parent control is resized. 您可以只设置属性设置为， ， ，或。You can only set the property to , , , or . 控件使用户能够重设大小的停靠的控件的停靠顺序中之前。The control enables the user to resize the docked control that is immediately before it in the docking order. 因此，若要使用户调整停靠的控件的大小，请将该控件停靠到容器的边缘，然后停靠到该容器的同一侧的控件。Therefore, to enable the user to resize a docked control, dock the control to an edge of a container, and then dock a control to the same side of that container. 有关详细信息，请参阅中的示例类。For more information, see the example in the class.

summary.span: 获取或设置在拆分器控件与容器另一侧的边缘（或停靠到该侧的最近控件）之间必须保留的最小距离。

span.span: Gets or sets the minimum distance that must remain between the splitter control and the edge of the opposite side of the container (or the closest control docked to that side).

summary.span: 已为 中的类似属性所取代，提供它仅是为了兼容早期版本。

span.span: has been replaced by similar properties in and is provided only for compatibility with previous versions.

value.span: 在 控件与容器另一侧的边缘（或停靠到该侧的最近控件）之间的最小距离，以像素表示。

span.span: The minimum distance, in pixels, between the control and the edge of the opposite side of the container (or the closest control docked to that side).
The default is 25.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于水平控件 (控件停靠到顶部或底部的容器)，留待未停靠的控件的容器的区域的最小高度为此值的高度减去控件。For a horizontal control (a control docked to the top or bottom of a container), the minimum height of the area of the container reserved for undocked controls is this value minus the height of the control. 对于垂直控件 (控件停靠到左侧或右侧的容器)，留待未停靠的控件的容器的区域的最小宽度为此值的宽度减去控件。For a vertical control (a control docked to the left or right of a container), the minimum width of the area of the container reserved for undocked controls is this value minus the width of the control. 用户不能移动拆分器超过此属性指定的限制。The user cannot move the splitter past the limit specified by this property. > [!NOTE] > 如果属性设置为负值，则属性值重置为 0。If the property is set to a negative value, the property value is reset to 0. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用控制结合和控件，创建一个窗口，类似于 Windows 资源管理器。The following code example uses a control in combination with and controls to create a window similar to Windows Explorer. 若要识别和控件、 节点和项添加到这两个控件。To identify the and controls, nodes and items are added to both controls. 该示例使用并的属性以免或控件的大小太小或太大。The example uses the and properties of the to prevent the or control from being sized too small or too large. 此示例需要在此示例中创建的方法在中定义，该方法调用的构造函数从。This example requires that the method created in this example is defined within a and that the method is called from the constructor of the . [!code-cpp[Splitter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Splitter Example/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Splitter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Splitter Example/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Splitter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Splitter Example/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置拆分器控件和控件停靠的容器边缘之间必须保持的最小距离。

span.span: Gets or sets the minimum distance that must remain between the splitter control and the container edge that the control is docked to.

summary.span: 已被 和 取代，且仅为与早期版本兼容而提供。

span.span: has been replaced by and and is provided only for compatibility with previous versions.

value.span: 在 控件与该控件停靠到的容器边缘之间的最小距离，以像素表示。

span.span: The minimum distance, in pixels, between the control and the container edge that the control is docked to.
The default is 25.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于水平控件 (控件停靠到顶部或底部的容器)，此值是可调整大小的控件的最小高度。For a horizontal control (a control docked to the top or bottom of a container), this value is the minimum height of the resizable control. 对于垂直控件 (控件停靠到左侧或右侧的容器)，此值是可调整大小的控件的最小宽度。For a vertical control (a control docked to the left or right of a container), this value is the minimum width of the resizable control. 用户不能移动拆分器超过此属性指定的限制。The user cannot move the splitter past the limit specified by this property. > [!NOTE] > 如果属性设置为负值，则属性值重置为 0。If the property is set to a negative value, the property value is reset to 0. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用控制结合和控件，创建一个窗口，类似于 Windows 资源管理器。The following code example uses a control in combination with and controls to create a window similar to Windows Explorer. 若要识别和控件、 节点和项添加到这两个控件。To identify the and controls, nodes and items are added to both controls. 该示例使用并的属性以免或控件的大小太小或太大。The example uses the and properties of the to prevent the or control from being sized too small or too large. 此示例需要在此示例中创建的方法在中定义，该方法调用的构造函数从。This example requires that the method created in this example is defined within a and that the method is called from the constructor of the . remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: 重写时在派生类中，请务必调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托接收事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 获取或设置拆分器控件和控件停靠的容器边缘之间的距离。

span.span: Gets or sets the distance between the splitter control and the container edge that the control is docked to.

summary.span: 已被 和 取代，且仅为与早期版本兼容而提供。

span.span: has been replaced by and and is provided only for compatibility with previous versions.

value.span: 在 控件与该控件停靠到的容器边缘之间的距离，以像素表示。

span.span: The distance, in pixels, between the control and the container edge that the control is docked to.

value.span: 如果 控件未绑定到一个控件，则值为 -1。

span.span: If the control is not bound to a control, the value is -1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于水平控件 (控件停靠到顶部或底部的容器)，此值是可调整大小的控件的高度。For a horizontal control (a control docked to the top or bottom of a container), this value is the height of the resizable control. 对于垂直控件 (控件停靠到左侧或右侧的容器)，此值是可调整大小的控件的宽度。For a vertical control (a control docked to the left or right of a container), this value is the width of the resizable control. 可以使用中的事件处理程序属性或事件，以确定控件大小的控件停靠到和限制其宽度为指定的最大宽度 (或高度如果水平停靠控件)。You can use the property in an event handler for the or events to determine the size of the control that the control is docked to and limit its width to a specified maximum width (or height if a horizontally docked control).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event SplitterMoved As SplitterEventHandler

summary.span: 当移动拆分器控件时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the splitter control is moved.

summary.span: 已被 取代，且仅为与早期版本兼容而提供。

span.span: has been replaced by and is provided only for compatibility with previous versions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以创建的事件处理程序事件，以便在应用程序中执行大小调整验证。You can create an event handler for the event to perform resize validation in your application. 例如，如果控件的边缘停靠控件和一个控件，您可以在编写代码事件来确定是否的最小和/或最大大小和控件已超过和调整到其最小值或最大大小控件的大小。For example, if a control is docked to the edges of a control and a control, you can write code in the event to determine if the minimum and/or maximum size for the and controls has been exceeded and resize the controls to their minimum or maximum size. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解事件发生的并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑更换与或将消息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`Splitter1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `Splitter1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序相关联事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#550](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#550)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#550](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#550)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以创建的事件处理程序事件，以便在应用程序中执行大小调整验证。You can create an event handler for the event to perform resize validation in your application. 例如，如果控件的边缘停靠控件和一个控件，您可以在编写代码事件来确定是否的最小和/或最大大小和控件已超过并限制其最小值或最大大小的控件的大小调整。For example, if a control is docked to the edges of a control and a control, you can write code in the event to determine if the minimum and/or maximum size for the and controls has been exceeded and restrict the resizing of the controls to their minimum or maximum size. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解事件发生的并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑更换与或将消息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`Splitter1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `Splitter1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序相关联事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event.
